name: Delve the Darkness
description:
Our entry for the Buddy Jam 4!

Delve into the depth in this turn based RPG. Navigate through random generated caves, slay monsters, do level-ups, collect loot, beat up shopkeepers . All this to become stronger and to prepare on the challenges that are waiting for you in the darkness.
Can you make it to depth 10 to face the ultimate evil?

Created By:

  • Stealthix - Lead-Programmer/Game-Design/Design
  • Magic_Spark - Game-Design/Sound
  • dunkingdev - Programmer
  • Azrail - Dialogues

Additional Credits:

  • Font: BLKCHCRY
  • Graphical Assets: REXARD
  • Sound Effects: GDC2019 Bundle (sonniss.com)
  • Background Music: Youtube Sound-Library
